pages.text: Stone generation in the world has drastically changed as you might have noticed. All stones can be processed in the $(l:machines/piston_crusher)Piston Crusher$() to yield various componets. They can also be crafted to form polished and brick variants along with stairs, slabs and walls.

The overworld generates with various layers of stone that occur at roughly the same height everywhere but can vary in thickness. The relative order of the layers is consistent across generation, but due to thickness variation a specific layer may be absent from an area. Stone types are also biome dependent with the main differences being between oceans, deserts/mesas (sandy) and other land biomes. Configs for stone generation are to come in the future.

pages.title: Intrusions
pages.text: Intrusions are pillars of rocks that emerge from bedrock. Some overworld stones and all the nether stones generate in this way. Configs for intrusion generation will be added in the future.
